channel.title: Change Directory of Cache When Play Runescape?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if anybody had made a client for Real-Runescape that saves the Runescape Cache files to another location other than C:\ Like i need one that could either load/save the cache from Net Or Drive E:\
Anybody Help me out?

item.title: Change Directory of Cache When Play Runescape?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you don’t have a C: drive it will save it to whatever is available, if you don’t want the cache saved at all use the unsigned client and it will just load it from the web.

Read full topic
item.source: Change Directory of Cache When Play Runescape?
